Question & Options:
In the movie 'Vikram Vedha' released in 2022, which actor was nominated for the Best Actor award at the 68th Filmfare Awards?
Options:
A. Hrithik Roshan
B. Saif Ali Khan
C. Ranveer Singh
D. Akshay Kumar

In the movie 'Vikram Vedha' (2022), which writers were nominated for the Best Dialogue award at the 68th Filmfare Awards?
Options:
A. Manoj Muntashir and B. A. Fida
B. Amitabh Bhattacharya and Gulzar
C. Prasoon Joshi and Javed Akhtar
D. Irshad Kamil and Sameer Anjaan
Correct Answer: Manoj Muntashir and B. A. Fida
